data.name: scGPS
data.description: A framework for clustering (CORE) and estimation of relationship between pairs of clusters (scGPS) from single cell data

evidence: "The scGPS package website is available at: https://imb-computational-genomics-lab.github.io/scGPS/index.html" (lab-branded site suggests a lab-owned research package).

"scGPS is a complete single cell RNA analysis framework from decomposing a mixed population into clusters (SCORE) to analysing the relationship between clusters (scGPS)." (end-user analysis framework, not just a library component).

"scGPS takes scRNA expression dataset(s) from one or more unknown sample(s) to find subpopulations and relationship between these subpopulations." (directly performs scientific data analysis; distribution only referenced via project website/source, no mention of package registries or binaries).
